column2: # Define class weights
class_weights <- c("0" = 1, "1" = 5)
# Define positive class weight
pos_weight <- sum(training$FraudFound_P == 0) / sum(training$FraudFound_P == 1)
# Train the model with class weights
model1 <- train(
factor(FraudFound_P) ~ .,
data = training,
trControl = ctrl,
method = "xgbTree",
metric = "AUC",
tuneLength = 2,
verbose = TRUE,
objective = "binary:logistic",
eval_metric = "auc",
scale_pos_weight = pos_weight
+ Fold01.Rep1: eta=0.2808, max_depth=6, gamma=3.685, colsample_bytree=0.5846, min_child_weight=0, subsample=0.7668, nrounds=961
